title: Strata Clean Energy Celebrates 15 Years of Innovation and Growth in Renewable Energy - Business Wire
summary: Strata Clean Energy celebrates its 15th anniversary as a leading provider of utility-scale clean energy solutions, showcasing its growth and accomplishments in the renewable energy sector.
green_innovation: TRUE - The article describes how Strata Clean Energy has evolved into a vertically integrated clean energy company, developing solar and storage projects that contribute to reducing carbon emissions and promoting sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE - The article highlights Strata Clean Energy's transition from a residential rooftop solar company to a leading provider of utility-scale clean energy solutions, showcasing significant improvements and market introduction of new products and business processes.
green_product: TRUE - Strata Clean Energy's focus on utility-scale clean energy solutions, including solar and storage projects that reduce environmental impact, promote sustainability, and contribute to a cleaner energy grid, aligns with the definition of a green product.
green_process: TRUE - Strata Clean Energy's commitment to innovation, sustainability, and transforming the energy sector demonstrates a green process by developing methods and techniques to minimize environmental impacts and promote a more efficient power grid.

title: Qcells North America Completes Dalton Factory Expansion - PR Newswire

green_innovation: TRUE. This expansion of solar panel manufacturing facilities aligns with environmental sustainability goals by promoting clean energy production and reducing carbon emissions.

green_product: TRUE. The article discusses the manufacturing of solar panels which help reduce carbon emissions and promote clean energy production, aligning with the definition of a green product.

title: CICE Funds Innovation to Advance the Measuring, Monitoring, and Verification (MMV) of Carbon Management - Canada NewsWire
